feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.35
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2975
  • ML file download logs by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2979
  • [mob][photos] Update flutter version to v3.24.1 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2978
  • [mob]Remove dst from crowdin template by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2981
  • [mob] Fix lint by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2988
  • [mob] Upgrade crowdin config by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2989
  • [mob] Skip untranslated strings by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2990
  • Tiny cleanup by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2986
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2984
  • [mob] Fix missing magic search by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2982
  • [mob] l10n changes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2998
  • Ml fixesv148 by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3028
  • [mob][photos] fix: creating a new album from hidden section is not hidden by default by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3030
  • [mob] add backup upload status screen by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3005
  • [mob][auth] Upgrade to flutter v3.24.1 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2980
  • [mob][photos] Fix: audio not playing on iOS when in silent mode by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3037
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.31 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3048
  • [mob] Open BackUp Status bar on tap of SyncStatus by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3049
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3090
  • [mob] Minor UX changes for backup status by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3094
  • [mob][photos] Trigger send logs on scale gesture by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3096
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3095
  • [mob][photos] Add option to enable or disable looping of videos by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3059
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.33 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3099
  • Ml logging by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3112
  • [mob][photos] Fix video player issues by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3110
  • [mob][photos][auth] Fix lockscreen not automatically appearing on opening app on iPad by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3100
  • [mob] Gracefully handle dup mapping by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3116
  • [mob][photos] Log index status of user by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3118
  • Clip vector by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3117
  • [mob] Change log and minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.30...photos-v0.9.35

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.42
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob][photos] Consider sample aspect ratio or pixel aspect ratio when parsing width and height of video used for calculating aspect ratio by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3126
  • mob: add back button to viewer screen by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3140
  • [mob] Upgrade uuid pkg & refactor upload by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3135
  • [mob] Ensure file is not uploaded before deleting localFile by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3147
  • [mob][photos] Log with .log instead of .txt by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3150
  • [mob][photos] Fix discovery section not appearing by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3151
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3172
  • [mob] Add additional logs & error handling on permission grant screen by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3177
  • Mob antialias by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3191
  • [mob][photos] Add CTA to send logs if stuck on local sync screen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3206
  • [mob][photos] Add New Album Card Widget for Collecting Photos by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2734
  • [mob]Fix build failing by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3213
  • [mob][photos] Kill the app on logging out from lockscreen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3214
  • [mob][photos] Require Authentication on App Reopen from Guest View by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3131
  • [mob][photos] Discovery tweaks by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3215
  • [mob][photos] Run clip and faces parallel in same isolate by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3193
  • mob: fixes by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3141
  • [mobile][photos] Improve magic section UX by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3235
  • [mob][photos] Increase time taken to show up send logs CTA on loading local photos screen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3238
  • [mob] Enable local import progress for iOS by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3239
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.37 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3237
  • [mob] Enable l10n for ja by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3240
  • [mob] Backup status fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3244
  • [auth] Fix duplicate tags entry by @kishan-dhankecha in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3243
  • [mob][photos] Fix exceptions from incorrect use of InheritedWidget by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3247
  • [mob][auth] Bump up auth to v3.1.4 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3248
  • [mob] Enable back up status & improve error handling by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3253
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3284
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3305
  • [mob] Remove tf so files by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3304
  • [mob] Fix sort order for backup status by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3306
  • [mob][auth] Upgrade flutter v3.24.3 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente
  • [mob][photos] Added dark theme assets for empty album state by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3318
  • [mob][photos] Fix grey screen flash from late initialisation error right after granting photo and video permission on logging in by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3316
  • [mob] Discover changes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3315
  • [mob] Minor fixes for discover by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3320
  • [mob] Extract strings by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3323
  • [mob] Change log by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3324
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/33
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/333
  • [mob][photos] Remove trigger to send logs from grant permissions screen by @ashilkn in

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.35...photos-v0.9.42

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.44
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob][photos] Add onPressed State Color for Custom Keyboard in App Lock by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3360
  • [mob] Fix various issues from bug tracking tool by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3362
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3413
  • [mob] Safe parse h/w from public magicMetadata by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3417
  • [mob] Discover improvements by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3421

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.42...photos-v0.9.44

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.46
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Fix Handling live photo dups with different zip side by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3452
  • Clip with preprocessing inside ONNX on mobile by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3467
  • Clip with preprocessing inside ONNX on web by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3466
  • [mob] Fix: Enable video upload without thumbnail for shared files by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3506
  • [mob] Misc bug fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3522

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.44...photos-v0.9.46

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.47
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob][photos] Remove legacy code in detail page by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3496
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3533
  • [mob][photos] log number of row in filesDB for debugging perf issues by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3564
  • [mob][photos] Fix build failing with xcode 16 update by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3576
  • [mob][photos] Prep for new release by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3624

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.46...photos-v0.9.47
